channel.title: Persona 4 Endurance Run
channel.description:
It's quite possible that I'm the only one who does, but does anyone else happen to follow the Endurance Run on Giant Bomb? [url=https://www.giantbomb.com/videos/]Click the Endurance Run thing at the top.[/url]
I don't know how to say it in an inviting way, so I'll just say this: It is two dudes playing some batshit insane JRPG and talking over it. And it is hilarious. It's probably the only instance I can imagine where watching someone play a game is more fun than playing it yourself.
There's a hella lot of videos, but it's good if you have a summer to waste. Like myself.

item.title: Persona 4 Endurance Run
item.dc:creator: Nuclear_Spoon
item.description:
It’s quite possible that I’m the only one who does, but does anyone else happen to follow the Endurance Run on Giant Bomb? Click the Endurance Run thing at the top.

I don’t know how to say it in an inviting way, so I’ll just say this: It is two dudes playing some batshit insane JRPG and talking over it. And it is hilarious. It’s probably the only instance I can imagine where watching someone play a game is more fun than playing it yourself.

There’s a hella lot of videos, but it’s good if you have a summer to waste. Like myself.
